title: 98/2/EC: Council Decision of 18 December 1997 fixing the amount of the Community financial contribution for 1997 to expenditure incurred by the Swedish authorities for the release of smolt
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 18 December 1997 fixing the amount of the Community financial contribution for 1997 to expenditure incurred by the Swedish authorities for the release of smolt (98/2/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The amount of the Community financial contribution for 1997 to expenditure on promoting salmon reproduction in the Baltic Sea shall not exceed ECU 575 382.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1997.
For the Council
The President
F. BODEN
(1) OJ L 226, 29. 8. 1980, p. 7.
